last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 3
last_episode_to_air.overview: The rail mobile detection team discover a high-tech home, complete with running water and TV, illegally erected under an arch. At Euston, there's no rest for Transport Police as they're called on to back up staff and deal with a Royal request.

name: The Station: Trouble on the Tracks
original_name: The Station: Trouble on the Tracks
overview: Going behind the scenes with staff at Birmingham New Street station to provide a vivid insight into the variety of situations they face, from flooding to industrial action, irate passengers, parties on the concourse and even nudity on the platforms.
